column5: Well after lots of stuff going on this summer and the weather not helping me I finally got out fishing.  First stop was Lake O for some Salmon action, lots of hooks but very little action it was just one of those days, but oooohhh to be on the water,. Dog was in heaven again  Around 10:am I decided to change up the baits again too see if it makes a difference and this was attached to the fly, swimming behind the boat for no idea how long I normaly change up every 30 min so somewhere between it hit and was swimming with us    Then a weekend of family stuff again then off too lake Erie for some Walleye action,  I headed out around 6:30 pm just too see if I could pick one up as the lake looked just a little bumpy  It was none stop, from the time I got too the right depth till the sun set and I came in, WOW is all I can say. I lost about 4 as they were missing the hook or while reeling them in they got off.  I did manage 2 in the boat.    Then Tuesday am, was out again, It was typical lake Erie calm close to shore, 4 foot rollers out..  Winds were too be 10k,  after about 2 hours I figured 25k then the coast guard said wind warning LOL.. Poor dog was green   I did manage 1 and lost a few unfortunately this one had some ugly growth and I know you can cut it out and eat but I figured the little guy had gone this long with it so over the side he/she went   All in All it was so nice to get out and report something ANYTHING...
Great report Lexx.  That first little shaker is a beaut, probably tasted wonderful too.  It makes me laugh when that happens  Sounds like Erie was happening for you too, nice pickerel there.  Joey

Great to see a report from you!  Great job out there on the big waters....some real nice fish there!  Four foot rollers and my little boat wouldn't mix to well....so I'll leave the big lake fishing to you guys with bigger boats....LOL.
Nice report and pix Lexx.  Glad you got some time out on the water.
Good fishing Lex!  Some nice walleyes and another Atlantic salmon!
Great report and pics LeXX  Good job and nice looking eyes! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice report lex, man those are niced sized pickerel...  big lake grows big fish i guess!!

great repor Lexx. Nice walleye...and as for the salmon....hmmmmm....you lucky so and so...dont get those up here. LOLOLOL i took my mum and dad out trolling for lakers a couple weeks back...we also dragged a couple fish around the ;lake for half an hour before realising they were there...DOH!
Glad to hear that you have been getting into a few.....keep the pictures of the pretty fish coming!  Oh and to echo ccmt, you can keep the 4ft rollers  lol
Great Report and nice fish. Maybe that pickerel was healing from some battle scars from a Musk or even a net!!
Great to see you got out Lex, and some real nice fish taboot!!!
